plot: On June 14th 2006, police forces attacked thousands of striking teachers in Oaxaca, Mexico, and turned the annual strike into a widespread popular rebellion.
title: Desde el filo de la navaja
plot_es: On June 14th 2006, police forces attacked thousands of striking teachers in Oaxaca, Mexico, and turned the annual strike into a widespread popular rebellion.
original_name: Desde el filo de la navaja
plot_en: On June 14th 2006, police forces attacked thousands of striking teachers in Oaxaca, Mexico, and turned the annual strike into a widespread popular rebellion.
